dublin_core.dcvalue: The overall goal of cStock is to improve reporting and visibility of community health logistics data. It is a RapidSMS-based reporting and resupply system that facilitates timely data transmission and communication between the CHWs and the facility that supplies them with medicines.
Community health worker or volunteer, Facility, Public sector health system (national, regional, district)
Sarah Andersson, Senior Technical Advisor, JSI, sarah_andersson@jsi.com
The Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation, mHealth Alliance International Working Group Grant, US Agency for International Development (USAID)|Presidentâ€™s Malaria Initiative (PMI), Global Fund
Data collection and reporting, Electronic decision support, Supply chain management, Child health, Family Planning, Malaria and other vector-borne diseases
